articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch6 Series releases 'World On My Watch' film via Cheil India - Campaign Brief Asia
articles.description: Cheil India has created a new campaign for Samsung Galaxy Watch6 series that aims to inspire users to enter a new era of connectivity, productivity, and well-being. The campaign, named ‘World On My Watch’, emphasises on the versatility of Galaxy Watch6 series…
